txt.en:
'Unlike the estates in the hills which you cleared for us earlier, Annúminas holds a special place for me. This is where my ancestors lived their lives.

'They shopped in the markets on these streets, worked in these buildings, fished from this harbour. They danced in the halls of Ost Elendil, swam in the waters of Glinghant, mourned in chambers of Haudh Valandil.

'Now, everything they stood for, what they strived their entire lives to build, the good they brought into this world and nurtured, I fear is now nothing more than the flicker of a dying flame.

'I for one will no longer stand by and watch as Angmar destroys all that I love. It is time that I draw my sword and join this battle.'
'Though it is tempered slightly, my wrath is not yet sated.'
Orchalwë's rage against the forces of Angmar is seeped in a deep and painful history.
Angmarim can be found within the bounds of the city of Annúminas.\n\nOrchalwë is desperate to defeat the Angmarim in Annúminas.
Orchalwë wants to speak to you.
